achieved.text: I was part of swirl team, involved in developing statistical  visualization charts and interactive graphs on statistical data generated by ML systems.
I had contributed to swirl framework in enhancing GUI based based on new wire frames, bug fixes by following frame work standard practices.
Built configurable, dynamic forms with supporting configurable dynamic components, from rich features supported by Swirl Framework platform.
Involved in improve performance of Anomaly Detection app and its usage at app development life cycle stages.
Involved in basic dev ops operations such Jenkins build for Swirl App and Anomaly App.
Involved in basic monitoring of Swirl & Anomaly app on Kubernetes environment.
Highly and always been motivated, enthusiastic in taking ownership for the work assigned.
Always writing reusable, modular, scalable & testable code.
